name: Betovix Casino

verdict.text: Betovix Casino presents a diverse range of online slots, table games, and live casino experiences from providers like PragmaticPlay and NetEnt.  The platform's strength lies in its extensive game selection, particularly the live casino powered by Evolution Gaming and other leading developers, offering over 300 live tables.  Their responsible gambling features, including self-assessment tests and self-exclusion options, demonstrate a commitment to player well-being. While licensing information isn't available in the provided text, the casino aims to provide a secure and enjoyable gaming environment.  The welcome bonus of 150% up to ‚Ç¨200 adds an attractive incentive for new players. However, the casino could improve by addressing its limited payment flexibility, as the ‚Ç¨20 minimum deposit/withdrawal and the daily/monthly withdrawal caps (‚Ç¨500/‚Ç¨10,000) might not suit all players.  The customer support, while generally helpful, could benefit from enhanced live chat stability and extended hours beyond 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.  Additionally, more transparency regarding licensing and security measures would enhance player trust. For the latest details on games, promotions, and services, visit https://betovix.com/.

security.title: Is Betovix Casino Safe?
security.description: Betovix Casino's security information is limited based on the provided texts. While the casino states a commitment to responsible gambling practices, including self-assessment tests and self-exclusion options, details about specific security measures are lacking. Industry-standard security protocols like SSL encryption are likely employed to protect player data during transactions and gameplay.  Further information about licensing, data protection policies (such as GDPR compliance), and third-party audits would be beneficial in establishing a clearer picture of the casino's security infrastructure.  Players are encouraged to contact the casino directly for further clarification on security measures and licensing details before engaging in real-money play.
